content: * you can find the free pattern here - https //cozynooksdesigns com/easystreettee/ 1 * you can find the lion brand yarn kit here - lionbrand sjv io/lkekgv 2 the easy street tee is a breathable summer knit perfect for staying cool in warmer weather its top-down raglan construction lets you try it on as you go for a custom fit and the twisted rib edging adds a crisp polished finish with a just-right neckline not too wide low or tight this tee is easy to dress up or down and wear through multiple seasons 9 sizes are included in the design considered easy level pattern includes - instant download pdf file professionally tech-edited pattern gauge level - beginner materials - 540 620 710 790 870 970 1060 1160 1190 yds/ 4 4 5 5 6 6 7 7 8 balls weight 4 cotton hemp yarn in the color cherry us 7/4 5 mm circular knitting needles 24 us 7/4 5 mm circular knitting needles 36 us 6/4 0 mm circular knitting needles 24 us 6/4 0 mm circular knitting needles 36 stitch holders or waste yarn stitch markers scissors tapestry needle 9 sizes xsmall small medium large x-large 2x 3x 4x and 5x this pattern has been professionally tech-edited to see more pictures and videos see here https //cozynooksdesigns com/easystreettee you can purchase the lion brand yarn kit pattern and yarn colors of you choice here - lionbrand sjv io/lkekgv *** if you buy 2 patterns - use code 2patterns for 10% off if you buy 3 patterns - use code 3patterns for 15% off if you buy 4 patterns - use code 4patterns for 20% off 1 https //cozynooksdesigns com/easystreettee/ 2 https //lionbrand sjv io/lkekgv
